about.title: Dani Díaz

bio.paragraph1: I am a Casting Director bridging the gap between Latin America and Europe. With over 12 years of experience, I have dedicated my career to finding the perfect face for every story.
bio.paragraph2: My journey began in theatre production in Lima, moving quickly into film and advertising casting where I discovered my true passion: connecting directors with authentic human emotion.
bio.paragraph3: Now based in Spain, I work internationally, bringing a unique bicultural perspective to every project. I believe that casting is not just about looks—it's about presence, essence, and the truth an actor brings to the screen.

about.quote: I am a Peruvian Casting Director with more than 12 years of experience leading projects across Latin America and Europe. I specialize in discovering authentic talent and creating inclusive, human-centered casting methodologies.

philosophy.title: Work Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: I believe in a safe, collaborative, and human-centered casting process.

humanApproach.title: Human Approach
humanApproach.description: Every actor is treated with dignity and respect. The audition room is a safe space for vulnerability and creativity.

authenticityFirst.title: Authenticity First
authenticityFirst.description: I look beyond the headshot. I search for the unique spark and real life experience that brings characters to life.

diversityAsNature.title: Diversity as Nature
diversityAsNature.description: Inclusion isn't a quota—it's a reflection of the real world. I actively seek out underrepresented voices and faces.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Whether you're looking for the perfect cast for your next feature film, commercial, or music video, I'm here to help you find the faces that tell your story.
